verbs.description: atlanta apex unit [V: is] working to keep guns off streets murder and robbery are down in the city of atlanta and the police department credits a lot of that to removing illegal weapons one of the big teams behind it is the apex unit atlanta proactive apex murder lt william ricker robbery apex unit
